content.p: The AMHT Division seeks new insights into complex biological and pharmaceutical systems. Using advanced analytical tools to accelerate the development of improved materials for biomedical and diagnostic applications. Our multidisciplinary group also applies its facilities for micro- and nano-scale characterisation to address primary challenges in the production and scale-up of medicines for global healthcare. View our currently available funded PhD studentships: Elucidating the role of lipids in fibrotic capsule formation at the surface of implanted medical devices. Investigating the Formulation and Implication of Topical Delivery as a Replacement for Subcutaneous Injections Biotherapeutic delivery through personalised 3D printed microneedle patches For all enquiries please visit: www.nottingham.ac.uk/enquiry
